attributes.action: intervene to stop the closure of the Post Office in St. Neot, Cornwall
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The residents of the village and parish of St Neot request that the Prime Minister intervenes to stop the closure of our Post Office.  The proposed closure should be stopped as this Post Office falls outside of the Governments stated criteria for such closures. If half the villages travel by car once per week to the nearest PO this will create an additional annual 150,000 carbon miles, contrary to stated government targets.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
